verbose_text: PI staining and caspase 3 activity assays revealed that cZNF609 silencing by siRNA1 or siRNA3 partially rescued HUVECs from oxidative or hypoxic stress induced cell apoptosis as shown by less PI positive cells (dying or dead cells) and decreased caspase 3 activity.
evidence: PI staining and caspase 3 activity assays revealed that cZNF609 silencing by siRNA1 or siRNA3 partially rescued HUVECs from oxidative or hypoxic stress-induced cell apoptosis
